subject: Adapter for Haptic Pedal Reactors
description_text: Hello, I would like to buy the haptic pedal reactors and mount them Horizontally to my Pedals. But I have no way of mounting them to my Simgrade VX Pro pedals. Do you guys know of anyone making adapters like these, or have any ideas how to mount them? Kind Regard, Boris Liposcak

conversations.body_text: Hi Boris-l,  You can check online to see if there are 3D-printable design models available.
Hi Boris-l,  Could you please take a few high-resolution photos of the pedals and send them to me? I’ll take a look.

I am not at home, but the brake pedal for example is exactly as shown here. I have seen an adapter for the Simagic haptic reactors on Etsy. But I would like to try the Simsonns as a 3 pack once i find a way to mount them
